name: Web Dk Software
description:
Web DK Software provides software services for the international market, in particular in German and French speaking countries. 
We have expertise especially in the tourism market by working close to our partners along the entire software development lifecycle. 
We cover all of Europe from our oﬃces in Strasbourg, Kehl, Cluj Napoca (our headquarter). Keeping a close eye on the market trends, we develop cutting edge software for our clients, using the latest technology.
